sentences.en: A small space or interstice in a tissue or part, such as the area bounded by small veins in a leaf or the wing of an insect.
sentences.cn: 小区，细隙，叶脉网隙组织或部分的小空间或空隙，如叶子中的细脉或昆虫的翼周围的区域。

sentences.en: Any of the open spaces in a net or network; an interstice .
sentences.cn: 网孔，空隙任一种网或网状物的镂空部分；

sentences.en: Any of the open spaces in a net or network; an interstice.
sentences.cn: 网孔，空隙任一种网或网状物的镂空部分；空隙。

sentences.en: In some particular environment or super - normal loading conditions ( eg , bath houses ) , the interstice should be shorter.
sentences.cn: 在特别的使用环境或超常的载荷条件下——比如热水 浴场 —— 安装时可能需要更短的间距.

sentences.en: Nature Gold is hosted in that as fissures ? interstice ? margin and crystal face of the Pyrite.
sentences.cn: 自然金常赋存于 黄铁矿 颗粒的裂隙、晶隙、边缘及晶面上.

sentences.en: The numerical modeling result shows the intuitive wave field characteristics of Rayleigh wave in interstice media.
sentences.cn: 数值模拟结果非常直观地揭示了瑞雷面波在裂缝介质中的波场传播特征。

trans.tran_en: a small space or crack in something or between things
